about_the_game:
There's a new cosplay festival in town! 50 new photos from this colorful event are waiting for you.
Beautiful girls dressed as famous and not so famous heroes in the format of relaxing puzzles.

disclaimer
All the girls from this add-on never existed in reality and display persons of legal age.
Please do not add or download this add-on if you are under the age of majority, such content offends you or violates the laws of your country.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains images of partially nude women (topless) of legal age.

There's a new cosplay festival in town! 50 new photos from this colorful event are waiting for you.

name: Art-Therapy: Portraits - Cosplay Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With DirectX 11/12 support
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: There's a new cosplay festival in town! 50 new photos from this colorful event are waiting for you.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, Tatar*, French*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Romanian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
